chapter.text: This bol revelation scripture GOD Almighty the Wise
My sent ona this scripture truthfully; ona kult GOD devoting tvoj nabozenstvo Him alone

Absolutely nabozenstvo je devoted do GOD alone Those set idols Him say My idolize them len bring us koniec GOD they je lepsie position GOD will judge them zretel ich disputes GOD NIE guide such liars disbelievers
GOD chudoba have syn He zvolit si whomever He willed z Jeho creations. He glorified He bol GOD 1 Zvrchovany
He created heavens zem truthfully. He zemla night dni zemla dni night. He committed sun moon each running for finite period. Absolutely He bol Almighty the Forgiving

He created ona 1 clovek potom created him jeho mate He sent ona 8 laskavy zivy inventar. He creates ona tvoj matka brucho creation creation do trimesters darkness! Such bol GOD tvoj Lord Do Him belongs all sovereignty! There nie bol inak god Him. Ako ona deviate

Ona disbelieve GOD nie need ktokolvek. He nemat rad see Jeho servants robit zlo decision! Ona decide bol appreciative He prosim ona. Ziaden soul bears zhresit any inaksie soul. Ultimately do tvoj Lord bol tvoj spatny listok potom He informovat ona z everything ona robit! He bol fully aware z innermost thoughts

When human bol afflicted he implores jeho Lord sincerely devoted do Him! mat rad skoro mat rad He zehnat him he zabudnut jeho previous imploring sets idols rank GOD divert others Jeho chodnicek! Say Enjoy tvoj disbelief temporarily; ona incurred hellfire
it je lepsi 1 z those meditate night prostrating zostat aware z Hereafter je seeking zlutovanie ich Lord Say Je those zauzlit equal do those nie zauzlit? Len those possess inteligencia berie heed
Say O Moj servants verit ona reverence tvoj Lord those zavodny righteousness v this world dobry reward GOD's zem bol spacious those steadfastly persevere receive ich recompense generously limits
Say ja commanded kult GOD devoting nabozenstvo absolutely Him alone
Ja commanded bol utmost submitter
Say ja fear if ja disobeyed moj Lord retribution velka dni
Say GOD bol iba Jeden ja kult devoting moj nabozenstvo absolutely Him alone
Therefore kult whatever ona zelat Him. Say real losers bol those lose ich souls ich rodina Dni Vzkriesenie. Vela istota this bol real loss
They have masses z zapalit them pod them. GOD thus alerts JEHO servants O MOJ servants ONA reverence MNA
Mat rad for those discard kult all idols devote totally GOD alone they zasluzit happiness. Dat dobry zvest Moj servants
They bol jeden examine all words potom nasledovat the lepsie! These je jeden koho GOD guided these je jeden possess inteligencia
S zretel do those zasluzit retribution have ona save those mozem bol already Hell
Mat rad for those reverence ich Lord they have rezidencia rezidencia zostrojit for them s flowing streams This bol GOD's promise GOD never zlomit Jeho promise

Ona nie see GOD sends nadol sky zavlazit potom miesto it into podzemna draha wells potom produces it zasadit robit z various colors potom they grow until they turn zlty potom He turns them hay This bol reminder those possess inteligencia
If GOD renders 1 srdce content Submission he nasledovat lahky z jeho Lord Therefore woe those srdce hardened GOD's odkaz; they ist daleko astray

(GOD revealed TU LEPSIE Hadith; REZERVOVAT SI bol consistent points both ways Heaven Hell)! skins z those reverence ich Lord cringe therefrom potom ich skins ich srdce zmakcit up GOD's odkaz. Such je GOD's guidance; He bestows it upon whoever wills guided Mat rad for those sent astray GOD nothing guide them
Co lepsie than saving jeden je face hrozny retribution Dni Vzkriesenie? transgressors told Chut consequences co ona zarabat
Others them disbelieved consequently retribution afflicted them whence they never expected
GOD condemned them humiliation v this ZIVOT retribution Hereafter bol DALEKO zly they LEN ZAUZLIT
My cited ludia kazdy laskavy z vzor v this Quran ze they berie heed
Arabic Quran any ambiguity they bol righteous
GOD cites VZOR CLOVEK deals s disputing partners (Hadith) compared do a muz KTO deals s LEN JEDEN consistent ZDROJ (Quran)! Je they the same Chvalit je do GOD vela z them nie zauzlit
Ona (Muhammad) iste umrel len mat rad they umrel
Dni Vzkriesenie before tvoj Lord ona zaludnit feud 1 iny
Kto zly than jeden attributes je laicky GOD chvila disbelieving do truth pojdem him? bol Hell nie iba requital disbelievers
Mat rad for those inzerovat truth verit therein they bol the righteous
They get everything they zelat ich Lord Such bol reward for the righteous
GOD remits ICH sinful ROBOTA rewards them generously for ICH DOBRY ROBOTA
bol GOD nie sufficient Jeho servant? They lakat ona idols they set Him. Whomever GOD sends astray nothing guide him
whomever GOD guides nothing send him astray! bol GOD nie Almighty Avenger

Ona ziadat them Kto created heavens zem? they say GOD Say potom robi ona set idols GOD If GOD willed any adversity mna they relieve such adversity? A if He willed zehnat for mna mozem they zamedzit such zehnat Say GOD bol sufficient mna. Him trusters trust
Say O moj ludia robit tvoj lepsie ja robit moj lepsie; ona robit iste zalozit out
(Ona robit zalozit out) kto incurred shameful punishment zasluzit eternal retribution
My revealed scripture ona for ludia truthfully. Potom whoever guided guided jeho own dobry whoever ist astray ist astray jeho own detriment! Ona nie bol ich zastanca

GOD puts souls SMRT when KONIEC Z ICH ZIVOT pod I o the cas z SPAT. Thus He berie some ich spat chvila others allowed zotrvat zivobytie koniec z ich predetermined interim This zadovazit lekcia zaludnit kto zrkadlit
they invented intercessors mediate them GOD Say Co if they nie possess any power nor chapat
Say All intercession belongs do GOD Him belongs all sovereignty z heavens zem potom do Him ona spatny listok
When GOD ALONE zmierit sa srdce z those nie verit v Hereafter zbehnut sa aversion. when others zmierit sa Him they become satisfied
Proclaim Our god Initiator z heavens zem Knower z all secrets declarations Ona je the iba Jeden judges Tvoj servants ich disputes
those transgressed owned everything zem vecer dva krat mat rad vela they readily dat it avoid hrozny retribution Dni Vzkriesenie. They shown GOD co they never expected
sinful robota they zarabat shown them vela things they pouzivat mock will pod haunt them
If human touched adversity he implores us mat rad skoro mat rad my bestow zehnat him he says ja attained this moj cleverness! Indeed this je len test vela z them nie zauzlit
Those before them uttered same thing ich earnings nie pomoc them v the maly
They suffered consequences ich zly robota. Similarly transgressors present generation suffer consequences ich zly robota; they nie escape
they nie realize GOD bol Jeden robit zvacsit provision whomever He zvolit si withholds? These je lekcia ludia verit
Proclaim O Moj servants exceeded limits never zufalstvo z GOD's zlutovanie! For GOD forgives all zhresit! He bol Forgiver Merciful
Ona obey tvoj Lord submit Him totally retribution overtakes ona; potom ona nie pomoc
Nasledovat lepsie chodnicek ze pointed ona tvoj Lord retribution overtakes ona zrazu when ona menej expect it
Lest soul say Ako sorry ja je disregarding GOD's commandments; ja bol istota 1 z mockers
say Had GOD guided mna ja bol s the righteous
Al say when it sees retribution ja get iny chance ja zavodny righteousness
ano indeed (ona robit get enough chances Moj proofs pojdem ona ona zamietnut them turned arrogant became disbeliever)
Dni Vzkriesenie ona see faces z those kto lied GOD pokryvka s misery. bol Hell nie na pravo retribution for arrogant jeden
GOD will save those maintained righteousness; He reward them. Ziaden harm touch them nor will they have any zalost
GOD bol Creator all things He bol v full control all things
Do Him belongs all decisions heavens zem those disbelieve GOD's revelations bol real losers
Say it inak than GOD ona exhort mna Je kult O ona ignorant jeden
It revealed ona a those before ona ze ona vzdy commit idol kult all tvoj robota nullified ona bol losers
Therefore ona kult GOD alone bol appreciative
They never fathom greatness GOD whole zem bol Jeho fist Dni Vzkriesenie. Skutocne universes zahyb Jeho na pravo hand He glorified He bol vela i high needing any partners
Roh blown whereupon everyone heavens zem struck unconscious except those rezervny GOD Potom it blown znova whereupon they will all vzostup up looking
Potom zem ziara lahky its Lord Rekord proclaimed prophets svedok brought forth Everyone potom judged equitably maly injustice
Kazdy soul je platit for whatever it robit He je fully aware z everything they robit

Those disbelieved je led do Hell do zhluk! When they get it its zavora je otvorene its guards say Robit ona nie receive posol z ona recited do ona revelations tvoj Lord warned ona schodza this dni? They answer Ano indeed! word â€˜retribution' already znamka disbelievers
It said Zapisat zavora Hell wherein ona abide forever Co chudobny destiny for the arrogant
Those reverenced ich Lord je led do Raj do zhluk! When they get it its zavora je otvorene its guards say Peace je ona; ona zvitazit! Therefore ona abide tu forever
They say Chvalit je do GOD fulfilled Jeho promise us robit us zdedit zem enjoying Raj mat rad my prosim. Co dobry recompense robotnik
Ona see angels floating around throne glorifying chvalit ich Lord After equitable judgment issued do all it proclaimed Chvalit bol GOD Lord universe
